title: I would like to know the font in this picture
content:
I have a jpeg with a font that I do not recognize. If anyone can give me some ideas, I would be very appreciative. Thanks for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051223im_/http:/typophile.com/files/02_6607.jpg)

 [‹ Can anyone identify this font for me?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051223/http:/typophile.com/node/50455 "Go to previous forum topic") [Logotype id needed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051223/http:/typophile.com/node/50458 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nailzfan

comments.content: That’s a tough one, I think it’s [Papyrus](http://web.archive.org/web/20081020051223/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/papyrus/)
